title: Romantic Beach Pillow Pose
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference for both subjects. Preserve both individuals’ facial structure, proportions, skin tone, age, gender, expressions, and unique facial features exactly as in the uploaded image. Do NOT alter faces in any way.

Generate an ultra-realistic cinematic couple portrait in vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Scene: a serene beach shoreline with gentle ocean waves washing over dark wet sand. The couple is lying side-by-side on the sand, heads resting on soft white pillows, bodies aligned parallel to the shoreline. They are holding hands naturally between them, gazing into each other’s eyes with warm, relaxed smiles.

Clothing: Man wears a short-sleeve tropical floral shirt and rolled-up dark trousers. Woman wears a soft, flowy floral two-piece or dress with semi-transparent fabric. Both are barefoot. Hair appears naturally wind-touched.

Lighting: soft natural daylight, slightly diffused, no harsh shadows. Mood: intimate, calm, romantic, dreamy. Camera angle: perfectly top-down aerial perspective.

Framing: near-knee crop. If the uploaded image is not full-body, seamlessly extend legs, sand texture, shoreline, and waves with correct perspective and lighting continuity. Ultra-realistic skin texture, cinematic color grading, shallow contrast, high detail.
